name: daily_user_read_stat_count
description: Daily user read stat count compaired with yesterday.

rules.name: today
rules.rule: select current_date() as d, count(*) as c from user_read_stat where dt=date_sub(current_date(), 1) group by d

rules.name: yesterday
rules.rule: select current_date() as d, count(*) as c from user_read_stat where dt=date_sub(current_date(), 2) group by d

rules.name: difference_ratio
rules.rule: select ((today.c- yesterday.c) / yesterday.c) as difference_ratio from today join yesterday on today.d = yesterday.d
